mbanking.title: Mobile Banking BCA
instructions: Log in to your BCA mobile banking account and enter your m-BCA access code
Select “Daftar Transfer” or enter your 16-digit payment code
Enter your m-BCA PIN to initiate the payment
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening BCA mobile banking Anda dan masukkan kode akses m-BCA Anda
Pilih “Daftar Transfer” atau masukkan 16 digit kode pembayaran Anda
Masukkan PIN m-BCA Anda untuk melakukan pembayaran
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.

ibanking.title: Internet Banking BCA
instructions: Log in to your BCA internet banking account and enter your user ID and password
Select “Add Beneficiary” or enter your 16-digit payment code
Enter the amount to be transferred and your internet banking PIN
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening internet banking BCA Anda dan masukkan user ID dan password Anda
Pilih “Tambahkan Penerima” atau masukkan 16 digit kode pembayaran Anda
Masukkan jumlah yang akan ditransfer dan PIN internet banking Anda
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.

transfer.title: ATM BCA
instructions: Log in to your BCA mobile/Internet banking account and enter your access code/user ID and password
Enter the account number and amount to be transferred
Verify the account details and amount
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening mobile/Internet banking BCA Anda dan masukkan kode akses/user ID dan password Anda
Masukkan nomor rekening dan jumlah yang akan ditransfer
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.
